reviews.text: We have just enjoyed a very nice week at the Hobby Club Apartments in Porto Pollensa.The staff were very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay at the Hobby Club Apartments

likes.liked: — The location, freindly service, the beach view.
likes.disliked: — Might be a little too far from the centre of town for people with walking difficulties.

reviews.text: Our apartment was modestly furnished with a bedroom with twin beds and a large wardrobe and a pull out bed in the sitting room, which sleeps two people. The bathroom was a good size and very clean, the maids visit 5 times a week, changing towels and sheets, but wednesday and sunday is their day off. There are spare blankets in the wardrobe, which also has a also a small safe inside which we hired for 17 euros for the week, you get 3 euros back when you hand the key back in. There is a modern flat screen TV, the english channels were BBC1, BBC2, ITV3, CNN and SKY News and CBBCs. The kitchen is equipped with microwave, hob, kettle, toaster and plenty of cutlery, cups, plates etc.
reviews.title: Hobby Club versus Butlins

reviews.text: There is a small Spar supermarket next door that serves hot pies and pastries, but for your weekly shopping and ammenities go further down to the cheaper supermarkets which are about a 5 minute walk down the road.
reviews.title: it is what is says it is

likes.disliked: — The pool area could do with some upkeep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a ground floor apartment overlooking the pool, all of the rooms overlook it except the rooms at the front which face the lovely beach across the road. The pool is very clean and there were plenty of sunbeds but not enough umbrellas, luckily you don't get charged for using the sunbeds, you do if you go on the sunbeds on the beach though, best to buy a lilo from the supermarkets if you are to go on the beach every day.
reviews.title: Hobby Apt hotel - lovely place

reviews.text: Only just realised we didn't write our review last year! These apartments are a bit out of the town centre, but just across the road from the beach which is quieter than the central ones. That's why we chose it! A lovely wander into town for the choice of restaurants. Yes Spar is expensive - and tried to fob us off with yestreday's croissants early in the morning - though quickly exchanged them when I pointed it out!!
reviews.title: We're going back!

reviews.text: Apartments clean - cot provided was good - I saw where the "tray bed" under the sofa was - wouldn't want to use it! Good sea/room view. A couple of apartments look out next to the road - we'd suggest avoid them!
reviews.title: Enjoyable holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This year we plan to get those cheap buses other traveladvisors have suggested.
reviews.title: We return again and again
Good choice
reviews.text: Oh, and the pool was cold - but the sea was warm and near enough ... we couldn't understand everyone lying on a chair by the pool when the beach was so close.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked last minute for the end of August, a little apprehensive as we had in the past a bad experience in Majorca. Flights fantastic but as we arrived at just before 12:00 at the apartments we where told one was not ready! In jeans and t-shirts we ventured in the mid day sun around the town. At around 1:30 the apartment was ready. Clean, roomy with a huge adequate bathroom. The only concern that we had was our 14 year old son had to sleep on the bed settee (more like a drawer from under the sette. He lasted one night then decided to sleep on the settee (more comfortable). Overall a clean and roomy apartment, pool clean, beach close by (we used after 5:00 as it was empty but still warm enough to go swimming.) As for eating out we spent several night at the Sinbad restaurant that is just down the road, good value for money and my fussy son ate everything they gave him! Also take the bus instead of a taxi it was extemely cheap and we travelled up and down the island.
reviews.title: Pollenca Experience
